original_title: Já Não Se Faz Amor Como Antigamente
overview: Film in three segments. In the first, father is suspicious about his son's masculinity. The second one shows a Don Juan-like guy who, at church for his own wedding, cannot remember who the bride might be. In the third, a rich husband tries to find the tattooed man he saw escaping through his wife's bedroom window.
title: Já Não Se Faz Amor Como Antigamente
